events.text:
[i]On your desk, you find your journal with a message for you.[/i]
"Hello there future me. As you have figured out, the [color=#efaca5]arrow keys[/color] allow you to [color=#A5EFAC]walk[/color] and the [color=#efaca5]X key[/color] allows you to [color=#A5EFAC]interact with people and objects[/color]."
"But did you know you can [color=#A5EFAC]progress through dialogue[/color] with the [color=#efaca5]space bar[/color]?"
"I hope this information helps!"
"From, Yourself"
"P.S. - Progress in life is always made with [color=#A5EFAC]opening the menu[/color] with the [color=#efaca5]C key[/color]."
